site.name: DICE Dental Academy
site.tagline: Learn Locally. Practice Confidently. Qualify Globally.
site.description: Pakistan's premier dental training institute offering advanced clinical training and international licensing exam preparation.

hero.headline: DICE Dental Academy
hero.subheadline: Shaping Skilled Dentists for Pakistan & the World
hero.description: Located in F-8 Markaz, Islamabad | Advanced Clinical & International Dental Training

about.mission: To provide comprehensive dental education combining clinical practice, academic excellence, and global exposure.
about.vision: To prepare dentists for local excellence and international practice.
about.description: DICE Dental Academy, located in F-8 Markaz, Islamabad, is a premier dental training institute dedicated to advancing dental education through hands-on learning, modern technology, and international collaboration.

whyChooseDice.title: Experienced Faculty
whyChooseDice.description: Learn from highly qualified local and international dental experts with extensive clinical and teaching experience.

whyChooseDice.title: Hands-On Clinical Exposure
whyChooseDice.description: Extensive practical training with mannequins and supervised patient care for real-world skill development.

whyChooseDice.title: International Exam Preparation
whyChooseDice.description: Comprehensive preparation for ORE, NDEB, Abu Dhabi DOH, and other international licensing examinations.

whyChooseDice.title: Modern Facilities
whyChooseDice.description: State-of-the-art training labs equipped with latest dental technology and digital dentistry tools.

whyChooseDice.title: Flexible Schedules
whyChooseDice.description: Weekend and evening batches available to accommodate practicing dentists.

whyChooseDice.title: Career Counseling
whyChooseDice.description: One-on-one mentorship and guidance for career advancement and international opportunities.

facilities.title: Modern Training Labs
facilities.description: Fully equipped dental labs with individual workstations and modern dental units.

facilities.title: Mannequin Practice Stations
facilities.description: Dedicated mannequin heads for simulation practice and international exam preparation.

facilities.title: Clinical Setups
facilities.description: Real clinical environments for supervised patient treatment under expert guidance.

facilities.title: Digital Dentistry Tools
facilities.description: CAD/CAM systems, digital scanners, and AI-integrated diagnostic tools.

facilities.title: Learning Resources
facilities.description: Comprehensive library with digital access to journals, textbooks, and video tutorials.

facilities.title: Comfortable Spaces
facilities.description: Well-designed classrooms and break areas for optimal learning experience.

studentSupport.title: Academic Counseling
studentSupport.description: One-on-one academic guidance and personalized learning plans.

studentSupport.title: Practice Facilities
studentSupport.description: Extended lab hours and equipment access for additional practice.

studentSupport.title: Exam Mentoring
studentSupport.description: Dedicated mentors for international licensing exam preparation.

studentSupport.title: Flexible Schedules
studentSupport.description: Multiple batch timings to suit working professionals.

studentSupport.title: Learning Materials
studentSupport.description: Comprehensive study materials, videos, and online resources.

studentSupport.title: Certification Support
studentSupport.description: Assistance with documentation and credential verification.
